column17:
Product Description

Where you choose to use this suction basket is totally up to you. Use it in the kitchen for organizing your sink accessories or create valuable storage space in your shower with this practical basket. It adhere's to smooth flat surfaces using two suction cups so there's no need to make any mess and no need to get the tool box out. The item has drainage holes to allow excess water to escape and that allow the contents to dry quickly. It is made of durable clear plastic so it will fit with any bathroom shower or sink.
